about_the_game:
1166 is a psychological horror game following six people in Salem, Massachusetts and how their lives change when one of them is kidnapped….


Fight through pain, depression, and grotesque monsters to uncover the truth. The darkness has taken a hold, will you see the light or hide in the shadows? Or will you find another way? Will you slaughter everything in your path, or take a more passive approach? The choice is yours...

Made by a one man (and two cats) development team, this dark mystery has simple artwork, keyboard and mouse controls, compelling multiple endings and original music.


Key Features:

-Thrilling adventure with a deep story that captivates from beginning to end.

-Charming pixel-art graphics and a simple interface that gets out of your way.

-Complex characters, each with their own personality and agenda.

-Original soundtrack.

-Multiple endings, each with part of the whole story.

-Exciting combat that pushes you to move with caution.

-Available on PC, MAC, Linux.

-Occasional Pixel boob!


1166 contains strong adult themes and is recommended for player over 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
